public class LoginUtil {
ã€€public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {

ã€€ã€€System.out.println(â€œç™»é™†æˆåŠŸâ€);

ã€€public static boolean verify(String username,String password) throws Exception {
ã€€Connection con = null;
ã€€ResultSet rs =null;
ã€€PreparedStatement stm = null;
ã€€String sql = â€œselect * from users where username=? and password=? and status=1â€;
ã€€Class.forName(â€œcom.mysql.jdbc.Driverâ€);
ã€€ ã€€String url = â€œjdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/javaweb?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=utf-8â€;
ã€€String sqlusername = â€œrootâ€;
ã€€String sqlpassword = â€œpwdâ€;
ã€€con = DriverManager.getConnection(url,sqlusername,sqlpassword);
ã€€stm = con.prepareStatement(sql);
ã€€stm.setString(1, username);
ã€€stm.setString(2, password);
ã€€rs=stm.executeQuery();
ã€€boolean isSuccess=true;
ã€€if (rs.next()) {
ã€€ã€€isSuccess = true;
ã€€}else {
ã€€ã€€isSuccess = false;
ã€€}
ã€€ //é‡Šæ”¾èµ„æº
ã€€ rs.close();
ã€€ stm.close();
ã€€ con.close();
ã€€ return isSuccess;
ã€€}
}

entry.title: javaäºŒå‰æ ‘
entry.content:
æ‘˜è¦:æ•°æ®ç»“æ„


ä»Šå¤©ç»ƒä¹ ç”¨javaå®ç°äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„éå†ç®—æ³•ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆæˆ‘å…ˆç¼–å†™äºŒå‰æ ‘ç±»BinaryTreeï¼Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
package package2;
public class BinaryTree {

int data; //æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°æ®
BinaryTree left; //å·¦å­æ ‘
BinaryTree right; //å³å­æ ‘

public BinaryTree(int data) //å®ä¾‹åŒ–äºŒå‰æ ‘ç±»
{
this.data = data;
left = null;
right = null;
}

public void insert(BinaryTree root,int data){ //å‘äºŒå‰æ ‘ä¸­æ’å…¥å­èŠ‚ç‚¹
if(data>root.data) //äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„å·¦èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½æ¯”æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹å°
{
if(root.right==null){
root.right = new BinaryTree(data);
}else{
this.insert(root.right, data);
}
}else{ //äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„å³èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½æ¯”æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹å¤§
if(root.left==null){
root.left = new BinaryTree(data);
}else{
this.insert(root.left, data);
}
}
}
}
å½“å»ºç«‹å¥½äºŒå‰æ ‘ç±»åå¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºäºŒå‰æ ‘å®ä¾‹ï¼Œå¹¶å®ç°äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„å…ˆæ ¹éå†ï¼Œä¸­æ ¹éå†ï¼Œåæ ¹éå†ï¼Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
package package2;
public class BinaryTreePreorder {

public static void preOrder(BinaryTree root){ //å…ˆæ ¹éå†
if(root!=null){
System.out.print(root.data+â€-â€œ);
preOrder(root.left);
preOrder(root.right);
}
}

public static void inOrder(BinaryTree root){ //ä¸­æ ¹éå†

if(root!=null){
inOrder(root.left);
System.out.print(root.data+â€â€“â€);
inOrder(root.right);
}
}

public static void postOrder(BinaryTree root){ //åæ ¹éå†

if(root!=null){
postOrder(root.left);
postOrder(root.right);
System.out.print(root.data+â€â€”â€œ);
}
}

public static void main(String[] str){
int[] array = {12,76,35,22,16,48,90,46,9,40};
BinaryTree root = new BinaryTree(array[0]); //åˆ›å»ºäºŒå‰æ ‘
for(int i=1;i<array.length;i++){
root.insert(root, array[i]); //å‘äºŒå‰æ ‘ä¸­æ’å…¥æ•°æ®
}
System.out.println(â€œå…ˆæ ¹éå†ï¼šâ€);
preOrder(root);
System.out.println();
System.out.println(â€œä¸­æ ¹éå†ï¼šâ€);
inOrder(root);
System.out.println();
System.out.println(â€œåæ ¹éå†ï¼šâ€);
postOrder(root);
åˆ›å»ºå¥½çš„äºŒå‰æ ‘å›¾å½¢å¦‚ä¸‹:

å½“è¿è¡Œä¸Šé¢çš„ç¨‹åºåç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
å…ˆæ ¹éå†ï¼š
12-9-76-35-22-16-48-46-40-90-
ä¸­æ ¹éå†ï¼š
9â€“12â€“16â€“22â€“35â€“40â€“46â€“48â€“76â€“90â€“
åæ ¹éå†ï¼š
9â€”16â€”22â€”40â€”46â€”48â€”35â€”90â€”76â€”12â€”
